cell.paragraph: Deployment of an Eiffel ENViSioN! project is made simply through use of the existing integrated Setup and Deployment Project available through the new project dialog. All Setup and Deployment Projects can be used with all Eiffel ENViSioN! project types with the exception to the HTML Report Project (Enterprise Edition only), which does not create an Eiffel ENViSioN! project.
cell.heading: 2Deployment Types
cell.paragraph: Eiffel ENViSioN! projects have two types of deployable outputs accessible through the deployment project's Add > Project Output... context menu item.

list.item: Primary Output: The exe or dll(s) generated by the compiler on a successful compilation.
Debug Symbols: Debug symbol (PDB) files used in conjunction with the Primary Output for debugging purposes.

cell.heading: 2Deployment Merge Modules
cell.paragraph: If your project is using one of the provided ebcl precompiled libraries thereare merge module available foruse, if desired. These merge modules will automatically be referenced when deploying a project using one of the provided precompiled libraries.
